br.com.concepting.framework.web.resource
Class WebResource

java.lang.Object
  br.com.concepting.framework.caching.CachedObject
      br.com.concepting.framework.resource.BaseResource
          br.com.concepting.framework.web.resource.WebResource
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class WebResource
extends BaseResource

Classe responsável por armazenar as configurações utilizadas pelas rotinas de manipulacão de conteúdo WEB.

Since:
3.0
Author:
fvilarinho
